events.description: Jeremy Pena grounds out, third baseman Matt Chapman to first baseman Vladimir Guerrero Jr. 1 out

Jake Meyers grounds into a double play, third baseman Matt Chapman to second baseman Santiago Espinal to first baseman Vladimir Guerrero Jr. Kyle Tucker scores. Jose Abreu to 3rd. Chas McCormick out at 2nd. Jake Meyers out at 1st. 2 outs
